name: Luden's Echo

passives.name: Echo
passives.effects: Gain 6 ''Echo'' stacks. Dealing [[ability damage]] to an enemy consumes all ''Echo'' stacks to deal {{as|75|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} to them and, for each stack consumed beyond the first, an additional enemy within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 600 units of them, firing an orb at each secondary target that impacts after {{rutngt|0.5}} to deal the damage. If the number of additional targets fired at is less than the number of stacks consumed,{{ft|deal an additional {{as|{{pp|75*0.2 to 75*5*0.2 for 5|1 to 5|changedisplay=true|type=remaining ''Echo'' stacks}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|5*0.2 to 5*5*0.2 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Echo'' stacks|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}} AP)}} {{as|magic damage}} to the primary target, for a total of {{as|{{pp|(75*0.2)+75 to (75*5*0.2)+75 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Echo'' stacks|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{pp|key=%|(5*0.2)+5 to (5*5*0.2)+5 for 5|1 to 5|type=remaining ''Echo'' stacks|changedisplay=true|showtype=false}} AP)}}|deal an additional 20% damage to the primary target for each remaining ''Echo'' stack}}

effects_structured.raw: Dealing ability damage to an enemy consumes all ''Echo'' stacks to deal 75 (+5% AP) bonus magic damage. For each stack beyond the first, fire an orb at an additional enemy within 600 units (0.5s impact delay) that deals the same damage.
If fewer additional targets are available than stacks consumed, deal 20% more damage to the primary target per remaining stack.

simpleDescription: High burst damage, good against fragile foes

schema_notes.effects_structured: Parsed from passive/active text for simulation use.
